text: 21:24 Aposel 18:18Nɨ me inigh ia Godɨn damazimɨn zueghsɨ, arazir kam damu. Egh me uan dapanir arɨzibagh isamin ofaba, nɨ adagh ivezam. Nɨ kamaghɨn damightɨma, gumazamiziba bar fogh suam, ka ti akar ifavaritam, ezɨ nɨ uaghan Judan Arazibagh ami.21:24 Nɨ Aposelbar Ingangariba 18:18ɨn gan, uaghan Dɨboboniba 6:1-21.
